Package ch.pschatzmann.scad4j

Class SCAD4JObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.SCAD4JObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCAD, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Command, Comment, Cube, Cylinder, Echo, Group, Import, Polygon, Polyhedron, RegularPolygon, SCADObject, Sphere, Square, Text, Use
    public class SCAD4JObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISCAD
    Common functionality for all SCAD objects
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
